section.title: WindowsDesk
section.para: Moves the selected window to another desktop.

This command has been removed and must be replaced by , the arguments for which are the same as for the
command.
section.important:
You cannot simply change the name of the command: the syntax has changed. If you used:
WindowsDesk n
to move a window to desk n, you have to change it to:
0 n
